email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, with a DWT of 150,000 and LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Our starting freight quote is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit higher than expected. Could you consider moving to the mid-40s ($45.50 per ton)? Also, could you confirm the vessel’s availability and any demurrage terms? Looking forward to your reply. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I understand your position, but the mid-40s is a bit tight given current market conditions. How about we meet in the middle at $48.00 per ton? The MV Ocean Star is confirmed available for your laycan. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised offer. $48.00 per ton is acceptable, provided we can lock in the laycan and confirm the demurrage terms. Can you send over the draft charter party agreement for review? Also, any chance we can push the laycan start to October 14? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, glad we’re making progress. I’ve checked with the vessel owner, and October 14 works for the laycan start. I’ll send over the draft charter party agreement shortly, including the agreed freight rate of $48.00 per ton and demurrage at $25,000 per day. Let me know if you need any adjustments. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the draft charter party agreement, and everything looks good. Let’s proceed with the terms as discussed. Please confirm once the agreement is finalized. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! The charter party agreement has been finalized and sent to you for signature. The MV Ocean Star is confirmed for your cargo, with laycan October 14-20 and freight rate of $48.00 per ton. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
